body: Hey doods, currently I'm temp banned, but I've got something else to share! Before I was banned, I recorded some Pvp footage, and some of my tactics. Basically it's a video showing my pvp strats. :) LINK: http://youtu.be/bbpPUHyaams

title: New youtube vid :)

replies.body: Oh and the bit about crit jumping if you get hit whilst jumping you get comboed so hard :p
